#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <stdint.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base :: sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	int t,n;
	double x;
	vector<double> X;
	vector<double> Y;
	cin>>t;	
	double  area=0;
	for(int i=0; i<t;i++)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(int j=0; j<n;j++)
		{
			cin>>x;
			X.push_back(x);
		}
		for(int j=0; j<n;j++)
		{
			cin>>x;
			Y.push_back(x);
		}
		int k, j=n-1;
		for (k=0; k<n; k++) 
		{
			area+=(X[j]+X[k])*(Y[j]-Y[k]); 
			j=k; 
		}

		cout.precision(1);
		cout << fixed<< area*0.5<<"\n";
		area=0;
		X.clear();
		Y.clear();
	}




	return 0;
}
